sentence.Network_en: They were gunned down by members of the trigger-happy National Guard.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被那些肆意开枪的国民卫队士兵枪杀了。

sentence.Network_en: Some of them are a bit trigger-happy — they'll shoot at anything that moves.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们中的一些人有点以开枪为乐事——他们会向任何移动的物体射击。

sentence.Network_en: Thank goodness the new premier is not as trigger - happy as his predecessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 谢天谢地,新总理不像他的前任那样好战.

list.abs: be careful , cops in la are trigger happy ., 小心点 , 洛杉矶的警察总是喜欢开枪.
Some called him a trigger - happy candidate ., 有些人说他是个好战的候选人.

entry.tran: 好动武的;爱动用武器的;爱开枪的;以开枪为乐的
entry.def: If you describe someone as trigger-happy, you disapprove of them because they are too ready and willing to use violence and weapons, especially guns.

example.ex: They were gunned down by members of the trigger-happy National Guard…
example.tran: 他们被那些肆意开枪的国民卫队士兵枪杀了。

example.ex: Some of them are a bit trigger-happy — they'll shoot at anything that moves.
example.tran: 他们中的一些人有点以开枪为乐事——他们会向任何移动的物体射击。

means.word_mean: 1. irresponsible in the use of firearms
2. marked by extreme intensity of emotions or convictions; inclined to react violently; fervid;

auth_sentence.content: Will she still be happy going to after-school clubs?

auth_sentence.content: My parents are very happy for me as well.

auth_sentence.content: We human beings need others to be truly happy.
